tour.calendar.desc: Overview of projects in the month. Click an event to open details.

tour.exportExcel.desc: Download this month's schedule as an Excel file.

tour.exportPDF.desc: Download this month's schedule as a PDF file.
tour.seed.title: Seed Demo Data
tour.seed.desc: In Local mode, create sample Auckland jobs.
tour.more.title: More / Collapse
tour.more.desc: Show or hide extra action buttons.
tour.pff.name.title: Project name
tour.pff.name.desc: Enter a short, descriptive project name.
tour.pff.address.title: Address

tour.pff.team.title: Team members

tour.drawer.note.desc: Leave a note about progress or blockers.

tour.drawer.edit.title: Edit full details
tour.drawer.edit.desc: Switch to full edit mode for all fields.
tour.drawer.cancelEdit.title: Cancel edit
tour.drawer.cancelEdit.desc: Discard unsaved changes and exit edit mode.
tour.drawer.archive.title: Archive / Unarchive
tour.drawer.archive.desc: Hide completed or inactive projects from the active list.
tour.drawer.delete.title: Delete project
tour.drawer.upload.title: Upload photo
tour.drawer.upload.desc: Attach site photos to the project.

tour.drawer.close.desc: Close the panel and return to the list.
